title: The Pirate Substitute
subtle:
Fantasy (fiction), 636 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 580L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and P
description: Many students look forward to school days when they have a substitute teacher, but what would it be like if their substitute teacher was a pirate? The Pirate Substitute is a delightful book about the life lesson a pirate substitute teaches a shy student in his class. Detailed illustrations and lively text keep students engaged in the story. This book can also be used to teach students how to retell the events of a story as well as to analyze characters in order to better understand the text. The book and lesson are also available for levels J and P.
